# The `DefaultDoCastIfPossible` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This cast trait just provides the default implementation of doCastIfPossible to make <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo</a> specializations more declarative. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This cast trait just provides the default implementation of doCastIfPossible to make <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo</a> specializations more declarative.

The <code>Derived</code> template parameter <em>must</em> be provided for forwarding castFailed and doCast.

Definition at line 309 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/casting-h">Casting.h</a>.
